title: Playing Twitch; Bard ulted the enemy team every time I tried to ult.
body:
Eventually lost it because that would destroy our teamfight potential every single time.

This doesn't make Bard a bad champ; there's just a lot of crappy people playing Bard right now.

Bard's ult is used to peel or disable the backline, not to zhonya's everything when a teamfight is in full swing and your allies are trying to ult.
